replies.body: This is messed up. Suits of armour dealing ad? Veils doing ap? A staff that tanks? You should have just removed them from the game and made new items.
the best part about this patch was seeing Graves's icon with a cigar in his mouch
This made me saltier than {{champion:136}} getting no cosmic or dark star skin after all these champs getting new skins for them.
lmao{{champion:136}}
Why doesn't he have the cigar in all the other images of him????? Is this some spoiler for how the next update will be giving him a cigar finally??
I thought Rito removed the cigar because they don't want to be seen promoting smoking.
lmao
Will the passive of Doran´s shield (basic attack damage+5) work on champions? If that works can I have 5 shields? lol
I just tested it out in practice mode, turns out the passive does indeed stack, however it only works on MINONS, i don't know why it doesn't say it in here, (Says it on the item in game though)
And now, we wait for the nerfs.

Where are the Ryze chromas! I like blue but I also want a dark Ryze (with maybe black or dark blue/purple color), white Ryze or Green Ryze would be cool too! 

(maybe I'm just stingy and prefer cheap chromas over skins that are triple the price :3)
Well graves just got gutted from the combo change, and you got rid of the mr true grit last patch? There goes a waste of time getting him to lvl 7 :/
Removing max HP will really affect a lot of champions since there arent many 500 HP items anymore, and the runaans nerf was a msitake

Didn't realise the "tank update" was we've reworked 3 champions only and 2 of them were already viable.

rip on hit kog, pretty sure hurricane had the original purpose of an on-hit item before the zeal bs. 
Game is boring when everyone builds the same thing and plays the same champs. =[

Wow.  I havent seen anything as broken as new Sej since on release Vayne or Lee Sin.  When she charges in she can have OVER 1000 armour for 3 seconds, come lategame.  It's worse than an ulting Alistar, lasts 3 seconds and has a 9 second CD....  

If she gets thornmail she does triple the damage done to her by any ADC.  I like her, I want to see jungle tanks viable again, not permabannned.

Sure but when is it coming out?
and are there any changes to any other characters?

oops i did't realise it had gone through
still though JUST THOSE THREE?
So Spellthiefs Edge nerfed for champs like Morgana? DELIBERATION Tribute charges can only proc once every 1.25 seconds...That sucks!

I can't start a game with the new update(doesn't matter which client).. it crashes and gives me an error saying that directx is not compatible or something like that. does anyone else have this problem?
All these new cosmic and dark star skins, and still, Aurelion Sol gets nothing. I've had it up to here, riot. He'd better get a legendary in one of those sets soon.

mana coin to picked up by the Coin user
                ^ typo just thought id let u know
Fixed! Thanks for the catch!
the new banshee's veil has me scared, fizz will truly be immortal now... {{champion:105}}
o.o that's a lot of changes! thought it'd just be tank champs/items but this patch changes ADC, APC and support items. will be interesting to see how it all works out
